reviews.review:
Доводы, почему я не рекомендую эту игру:
-Крайне однообразный геймплей, кто бы что не говорил, который лично мне очень быстро приелся. Изменения в игре происходят очень редко
-Засилье читеров(погуглите читы на КС:ГО и будете очень удивлены)
-Часто встречаются неадекватные игроки, которые портят впечатление от игры
this game has trash hitboxes, please fix
Jogo bom para jogar com amigos
No cheaters, very few Russians, and most of them are really friendly. Good looking, has skins, you can trade with some positive people that want to help you. 11/9
A very fun game that can suck the life right out of you.
Good game, play it now, it's free
Este jogo é supimpa, traz uma nostalgia, show de bola.
bem legal, mas bugado pah garai meu irmaozin
its pretty fun but if youre in silver and hit any type of shjot youll get reported 10/10
this game is very intense and very competitive.
A great game! But A poopton of hackers unfortunately.
I wasted so much of my life to trying to learn this game and have now dropped it like a rock for Roblox :>>
got Global and hated my life
they said i should write something here
sebepsiz yere ban yedim ama gerçekten şunu söylemeliyim ki 5 kişi olduktan sonra eglencesi çıkan bir oyun
good game never fail to entertain me
The best team based competitive game :)
wdnmd  我以为这是个免费游戏
Very fun game. 9/10 would play again
Fun and competitive game. I would recommend trying it out.
jogo completamente bosta e só serve pra ganhar caixa pra vender
Great if you play on competitive.

É um turbilhão de sensações ao mesmo tempo que você está curtindo com os amigos, você também está puto por conta de chiter e boludo, você passa raiva e fala que nunca mais vai jogar e se encontra jogando menos de uma semana depois. O jogo é bom e é uma bosta ao mesmo tempo. 

OBS: Até hoje não consegui desinstalar.
some kid called me fat on dust 2 and i started crying because he was right
after a few thousand more hours i spent into this game im still gonna  say that this game is good
Esports game of the year everyone knows it, went from good to okay.
Jogo muito bom com otima jogabailidade competitiva, o unico problema são o cheates que a valve precisa remover
MUITO BOM O PROBLEMA É A QUANTIDADE DE HACKRS NO MODO FREE DO JOGO

I purchased this game way back when it was Pay To Play in my opinion i don't like this game as i feel the game play is sluggish and is not my type of game in saying that the game play is solid and if you like shooting games i would definitely recommend to give this one a try!

Wish i wasn't being honest here but i am. This game is great but the community is top three worst in the world. you may find those one of two cool and chill players but the majority of the time you will find toxic and brutally offensive players who will only trash on their team. Would recommend of you got thick skin. Would not recommend if you are a sensitive little bitch.
pay to play, I love it
Llevo 1k horas jugadas y en todo ese tiempo ningún cuchillo en mis cajas... Estoy considerando el suicidio...

После обновы с бесплаткой и платным праймом игра стала ебаной помойкой, в которую невозможно играть новичкам
Либо покупаешь прайм за косарь, либо тебя ебуть в жопу суки с читами
Хорошо, что у меня прайм
Times when you're feeling good about life, starting to believe in yourself, gaining that needed confidence. just jump on cs and you'll be put back in your hole. great game, i rate.

good game. terrible community. and aiming system that sometimes works. overall good game 10/10
